entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm] New interop `DisabledRuntimeMarshalling*` tests failing #64127
  • Assertion failed 'helper.CanEncodeAllOffsets(REGSIZE_BYTES)' during 'Generate code' #64125
  • UnhandledExceptionEventHandler in MemoryCache can cause a deadlock. #64115
  • Linux Arm64 TimeZoneInfo Duplicate DisplayNames #64111
  • .NET 6 crashes on a macOS 12.x virtual machine on Apple Silicon (arm64) #64103
  • Could not load file or assembly System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData in .NET 6 #64101
  • Single-file and self-deployed application encounters "random" System.IO.FileNotFoundException exceptions when loading libraries #64120
  • Special-case alternation with anchors in Regex analysis and code gen #64097
    7.0.0
  • Generation of dynamic types with multiple threads using System.Reflection.Emit components causes runtime corruption #64094
  • System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath throws OutOfMemoryException when calling Widen(pen). #64092
  • Type.GetMethod ignores BindingFlag.DeclaredOnly for records #64124
  • libnethost is only provided with release CRT #64087
  • fatal error LNK1295: '/INCREMENTAL' not compatible with '/DEBUGTYPE' specification... #64082
    7.0.0
  • .net6, GetManifestResourceNames return empty #64090
  • TokenBucketRateLimiter.WaitAsync() does not immediately reduce the _queueCount on cancellation #64078

Closed

  • Ordering issues with `DYN_BLK` nodes #62014
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: default state for all objects #64007
  • JsonObject does not respect JsonIgnoreCondition.WhenWritingNull #54184
    7.0.0
  • SSL_CERT_DIR/SSL_CERT_FILE with move over to Apple's libraries #60030
    Future
  • Cannot sign certificates with elliptic curve secp256k1 #61767
  • system.reflection.metadata.applyupdatetest.testaddstaticfield failing on OSX with checked coreclr #64117
  • system.reflection.metadata.applyupdatetest.testaddstaticfield failing on OSX with checked coreclr #64118
  • System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration tests failing on netfx x86 #64071
  • Clean up some RegexNode code #62651
    7.0.0
  • Setting LC_ALL=zh_CN.utf8 LANG=zh_CN.utf8 without using Globalization Invariant Mode in Linux has serious performance problems #64093
  • PathAssemblyResolver System.Reflection.MetadataLoadContext should be sealed or allow overrides #36753
    7.0.0
  • ILVerify complains about unbox; ldfld #63953
    Future
  • DiscardBufferedData does not skip BOM when the position is reset to the beginning #63789
    7.0.0
  • Cannot build mono wasm sample, error NETSDK1112: The runtime pack for Microsoft.NETCore.App.Runtime.Mono.browser-wasm was not downloaded. #64089
  • Test failure System.IO.Tests.Directory_CreateDirectory.DirectoryLongerThanMaxLongPathWithExtendedSyntax_ThrowsException #64080
  • [API Proposal]: System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeCompatibilityAttribute.DisableRuntimeMarshalling #60639
    7.0.0
  • MemoryMappedFile always flushing on dispose - even if nothing was written? #62768
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Introduce RandomAccess.SetLength(SafeFileHandle handle) method #58376
    7.0.0
  • JIT doesn't recognize memory read in Vector256.Create #53541
    7.0.0
  • Segmentation Fault #62387
  • Browser wasm on windows CI builds broken #63987

PullRequests

Created

  • Add additional loop table asserts #64126
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Commutative morph optimizations #64122
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add Android Maui Startup testing #64121
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Spmi replay asmdiffs mac os arm64 #64119
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • add osr plus stress tests for libraries #64116
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement support to Set Next Instruction Pointer. #64114
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Re-enable failing long path test #64113
    area-System.IO
  • Refactor `fgValueNumberBlockAssignment` #64110
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • pipelines: Add wasm jobs #64109
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add the exception set for `ObjGetType` #64106
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Reduce the size of HeaderDescriptor #64105
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Fix ReadyToRun loading on Apple Silicon (.NET 6) #64104
    community-contribution
  • vtable setup fix for generic default interface methods in mono runtime #64102
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [CodeSpace] Install v8 and Prebuild wasm #64100
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Make sure that shared memory object name meets the length requirements #64099
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Fix one source of perf regression in GCHeap::Alloc. #64091
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix minor things in comments to DllImportGenerator #64088
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • Fix crash when VS4Mac is debugging VS4Mac arm64 #64086
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Fixes a few issues for dprintf on OSX #64076
    area-GC-coreclr

Merged

  • Extract SuperPMI into a separate component #64035
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Ignore conversion exceptions during dictionary construction #63792
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Delete `GT_DYN_BLK` #63026
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Cleanup trailing whitespace. #64112
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Group 6] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.UserSecrets` #63700
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [Group 2] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection` #63836
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Address-expose locals under complex local addresses in block morphing #63100
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Handle embedded assignments in copy propagation #63447
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update branding for 7.0 Preview1 #64123
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove enable drawing on unix switch #64084
    area-System.Drawing, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Make ApiCompat.proj incrementally buildable #64037
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update format script permissions so it can be called on Unix systems directly. #64107
    area-Infrastructure
  • Revert "Enable System.Text.Json tests on netfx (#63803)" #64108
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Do not set `GTF_NO_CSE` for sources of block copies #63462
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Refactor optimizing morph for commutative operations #63251
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • RegexNode cleanup #64074
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Ensure several helper intrinsics are correctly imported and handled #63972
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixed IsFloatPositiveZero from returning 'true' on non-constant double operands #64083
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add StringSyntaxAttribute.Json #64081
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm][debugger] Apply changes on wasm using sdb protocol. #63705
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Avoid additional local created for delegate invocations #63796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ILVerify: Handle readonly references in ldfld #64077
    area-ILVerification
  • Update the macOS CoreCLR building documentation #63932
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix crash when VS4Mac is debugging VS4Mac arm64 #64085
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Initial WASI support prototype #63890
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix broken callstacks in interpreter on MonoVM. #60338
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Make ILLink validation steps in libs incrementally buildable #64041
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Implement System.Runtime.CompilerServices.DisabledRuntimeMarshallingAttribute on CoreCLR-family of runtimes/type systems #63320
    blocking, area-Interop-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • don't Flush readonly MemoryMappedViewAccessor on disposal #63794
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Introduce RandomAccess.SetLength #63992
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Enable some browser legs on the extra-platforms pipeline #64065
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add pmi_path argument to superpmi.py script and use it in the superpmi-collect pipeline. #63983
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove commented code #63869
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • Allow CreateScalarUnsafe to be directly contained by hwintrinsics that support scalar loads #62407
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Log message of unexpected exception in ThrowsAny #64064
    area-Meta

Updated

  • Android remove backward timezones #64028
  • Preserve existing keys in dictionary #63834
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Add COMWrappers to crossgen #63969
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • NativeAOT: ICustomMarshaller #62921
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add runtime support for `ref` fields #63985
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Extra tests for assembly name parser. #64022
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [Group 2] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Options` #63767
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution
  • [Group 2] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Abstractions` #64018
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Enable QJFL and OSR by default for x64 and arm64 #63642
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bump Intellisensense package version to latest from `dotnet7-transport` #63352
  • Begin using the xplat hardware intrinsics in BitArray #63722
    area-System.Collections
  • Morph `Vector.Create(0)` to `Vector.Zero` #63821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • More cleanups in assembly loader area #63157
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Updating and fixing unit tests for DirectoryServices.AccountManagement #56670
    area-System.DirectoryServices, blocked, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fixing update issue with multivalued properties #34267 #56696
    area-System.DirectoryServices, blocked, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Implement hash and HMAC stream one shots #63757
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • Member resolving fix for derived attributes (#62937) #63837
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix JsonObject constuctor #64055
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json
  • JIT: simple forward substitution pass #63720
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add blsr #63545
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix BigInteger.Parse returns bogus value for exponents above 1000 #55397
    area-System.Numerics, no recent activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • Optimize DateTimeOffset #58169
    area-System.Runtime, no recent activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Dispose LdapConnections used by PrincipalContext.ValidateCredentials #62036
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Skip AOT of Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.dll for WASM, due to out-of-memory issues in CI #63958
  • Move libunwind directories to src/native/external #64043
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement IEquatable<T> on value types overriding Equals (and enable CA1066/CA1067) #63690
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Faster IndexOf for substrings #63285
    area-System.Memory
  • Trying to fix issue #63788: "NetworkChange.NetworkAddressChanged event leaks threads on Linux #63963
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [Android][libs] Enable Internal.Console.Write in System.Private.CoreLib #63949
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Restrict parallelism in LLVM FullAOT compile, to prevent OOM #63800
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Support chrome debugging using chrome://inspect #63900
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Port Mono to Raspberry Pi, ship as new linux-armv6 RID #62594
    area-Infrastructure-mono, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add Match and isMatch ReadOnlySpan<char> overloads as well as Regex protected methods which expose ReadOnlySpan<char> to avoid allocations. #62509
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add CancellationToken to TextReader.ReadXAsync #61898
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Ignoring leading dot when comparing cookie domains #64038
    area-System.Net
  • Add JIT support for control-flow guard on x64 and arm64 #63763
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Detect truncated GZip streams #61768
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure
  • Stop using `CLS_VAR` for "boxed statics" #63845
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Do not hoist constants if they will not be CSEed #64039
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Morph `ASG(ONE_FLD_STRUCT, CALL)` using `BITCAST` #61049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Port MD4 managed implementation from mono/mono #62074
    area-System.Security
  • #51371 fixed failing test in iossimulator #63877
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add missing handle function enter/return macros #64061
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Remove spaces from GH labels used by FabricBot #64048
    * NO MERGE *, area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • Unify reading from procfs to get network related information #63696
    area-System.Net
  • issue-22928 Add ImmutableArray Span-based APIs #61196
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Switch default modules to es6 #62740
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Throw during renegotiation if there is incomplete received TLS frame #64066
    area-System.Net.Security
  • 62606 Return fully qualified path from FileSystemEventArgs #63051
    area-System.IO, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: DirectoryInfo.CopyTo / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Update Roslyn and use new step tracking API in incremental tests. #63978
    area-Infrastructure
  • Simplify alignment block marking #62940
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] JIT/EE interface for getting ABI-info #62893
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Moved AssemblyName helpers to managed #62866
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • force extra warmup #64075
    * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure

Issues

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet build/publish produces RID-specific apps by default #23540
  • dotnet build/publish uses the implicit SDK RID for RID-specific apps by default #23539
  • Silent incorrect behavior when global.json version lacks patch field #23535
  • Renable packaging tests disabled for the helix merge #23533
  • reenable tests blocked by the install script bug #23531
  • .NET 6.0.102 SDK with 5.0.104 runtime, there is an error text if new a 5.0 ProjectTemplate #23526

PullRequests

Created

  • rtm Branding for 6.0.2xx #23538
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1565848 #23536
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #23532
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Skip restoring 1.x in Source Build #23534
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix version.details entry for System.Commandline #23519
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #23504
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Allow print rollback when non-admin. #23326
    Area-Workloads, 6.0.3xx
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1565704 #23508
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable additional test projects to run on helix #23381
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove 1.0.5 and 1.1.2 installs from our linux runtimes #23525
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-21
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: "file private" visibility #5529
  • [Proposal]: Disable CS0436 by default #5528
  • [Proposal]: Label statements #5470
  • Champion "params Span<T>" #1757

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • VS completely crashes upon writing a faulty Attribute #59003
  • CS1997 is anachronistically specific. #59001
  • AliasSymbol.Equals throw NullReferenceException when comparing two global symbols #58999
  • Unclear CS0252 (Possible unintended reference comparison) #58996
  • Provide setting to hide "var" visually and replace it with the explicit type #58995
  • Investigate why „ ” in Polish translations doesn't show correctlly #58994
  • the flag (tag? dont know the name) regarding inheritance is misleading #58992

Closed

  • .editorconfig "Value cannot be null. Parameter name: path" at Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Editor.EditorConfigSettings.Extensions.SolutionExtensions.<>c.<G #58732
    17.2
  • Completion for an explicit implementation of a conversion operator produces invalid code #53924
    17.1
  • Need VS2022 17.0.5 release notes #58963
  • Adds the description of the exceptions documentation in the QuickInfo popup. #59000
  • Exception in AbstractAsynchronousTaggerProvider #58986
  • Go To Base on a member with a single base in metadata fails to navigate #58964
    17.2
  • EnC: Multi-line active statement span not calculated properly #58179
    17.2.P1
  • Some nullable parameters are null-checked #58929
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Annotate CSharpSyntaxTree.Create path parameter as nullable #59005
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix documentation bug on SyntaxFactory.VerbatimIdentifier #59004
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Consolidate globalconfig #59002
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add docs/compilers and docs/ide to CODEOWNERS #58993
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Support `u8` type suffix for UTF8 string literals. #58991
    Area-Compilers
  • Correctly update the list of generators for a call to WithAnalyzerReferences #58990
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge, 17.1
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #58989
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Backport SpillSequence Fix to 17.1 #58788
    Area-Compilers, Approved to merge
  • Defer part rejection exception in VSTypeScriptFormattingService to time of construction #58940
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove special interpolation brace kinds #58978
    Area-Compilers
  • don't include implicit/explicit keywords when completing explicit interface operator #53938
    Area-IDE, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces, Next
  • Update CompilerNuGetCheckerUtil.cs #38826
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, Next
  • Assert compiler diagnostics in param-null checking test #58951
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Fix Go To Base for a symbol with a single metadata location #58965
    Area-IDE, Next
  • [EnC] Store entire spans instead of line deltas #58831
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Delete CodeAnalysisRules.ruleset #58968
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Add a tagger that draws a line to indicate the indentation level of a raw string literal. #58518
    Area-IDE
  • Clarify parameters #58985
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #58988
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Allow xml docs to still be created when 'emit metadata only' is on. #57667
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #59007
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #59006
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Correctly handle additional inputs to user-defined conversions #58730
    Area-Compilers
  • Added additional test from duplicate VS feedback item. #57860
    Area-Compilers
  • Update tests to catch the MEF v2 creation failure #58975
    Area-IDE
  • Add integration test for bug #46794
    Area-IDE, auto-merge
  • Null annotate the implementations of ISyntaxTreeFactoryService #48820
    Area-IDE
  • Document why we have -vs-deps branches #41153
    Area-Infrastructure, Documentation
  • Enable null on UseExplicitTypeCodeFixProvider #58866
    Area-IDE
  • Add external access to stacktrace APIs for Unit Testing #58082
    Area-IDE
  • 🧹 Services cleanup following previous review #49127
    Area-IDE
  • Cache delegates created from static methods #19452
    Area-Compilers, cla-already-signed, PR For Personal Review Only
  • Address param-nullchecking public API design review #58987
    Area-Compilers
  • Introduce Parameter Should Not Try to Introduce on a Parameter #58959
    Area-IDE
  • Fixed IDE0044 (Make Field Readonly) for DataMember fields in DataContract classes #43489
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Apply source-build patches #58727
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use new document formatter to format when a type is moved to a new document #58977
    Area-IDE
  • [WIP] Code diagnostic and fix provider for 45832 "Make anonymous function static" #46429
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix Nested interpolation #42195 #42255
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Adds analyzerconfig documentation to csc usage message #43283
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Update description of Microsoft.Net.Compilers.Toolset #46962
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Respect ReportSuppressedDiagnostics option for DiagnosticSuppressor #53045
    Area-Analyzers, Community
  • tweak diagnostic create warning level documentation wording #53718
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Community
  • Resolves issue #53426, translations missing #56885
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Minor updates to "Using additional files" docs #57493
    Area-Analyzers, Community
  • [semi-auto-props]: Refactor and rename 'AccessingAutoPropertyFromConstructor' #58832
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Update xunit.analyzers #46349
    Area-Analyzers
  • API for getting a deterministic key for a Compilation #57134
    Area-Compilers
  • Filter cancellation exceptions in generator driver #58843
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.2
  • Initial documentation for the TestAccessor Pattern #28967
    Area-IDE
  • Improve integration test logging #36762
    Area-Infrastructure
  • draft #58910
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Don't remove cast when converting method group to object #58920
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Use interpolated string handler for Contract.ThrowIf methods #58173
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add CompilerGeneratedAttribute to record members #58542
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Language Feature - Records
  • [Translations] Replace „ and ” to ' #41095
    Tenet-Localization, PR For Personal Review Only, Community
  • Update cross-platform build docs... #29924
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Improved formatting of CodeGen Differences #30361
    Documentation, Area-SDK and Samples, Community
  • [draft] IDE response to raw string literals #58846
    Area-IDE
  • Refactor indentation API #57529
    Area-IDE
  • Compiler warning CS8600 message: say possibly null-valued expression #58860
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Using RazorSourceGenerator in VS 2019 results in watson errors #39693
  • Analyzer: Warn that IResult should not be returned from Controller Actions #39692
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Razor: <partial>as direct child of @if does does compile #39691
  • .NET 6.0.101 ASP.NET MVC globalization and localization is not working #39689
  • Authorization fails in Controllers after Login is successful #39688
  • Consider adding support for `TryParse` as a way to bind primitives #39682
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor WASM hosted feature request: analyzer that detects missing server dependencies #39674
  • [Component Vulnerability]please consider to upgrade node-fetch in @microsoft/signalr from @^2.x.x to @^3.1.1 #39672
    7.0-preview2
  • ClientCertificate expired causing test failures #39669
    Test failures

Closed

  • [Question] :Is MAUI.NET blazor shipped with a browser like electron? #39673
  • Hot Reload doen't work with UseResponseCompression Enabled #38832
  • Solutions with a standalone JavaScript project and an asp.net web API project seems tied to visual studio / windows #38861
  • HotReload Takes minutes to process when updating a CSHTML file. #39677
  • Request: `dotnet watch` with specific build Configuration (and Hot Reload) #38133
  • Consider a nicer API for configuring JsonOptions for minimal actions / route-to-code #39226
    7.0-preview1
  • Perf regression: mvc #39646
  • Rendering Razor component in server mode in MVC project in partial view - left with empty tag -> related to issues 20332 (unresolved) , 13771 #39214
  • Rename BuildIisNativeProjects -> UpdateIISNativeAssets #39654
    7.0-preview1
  • Regression in Blazor build performance with 7.0 SDK #37827
    7.0-preview1
  • the runtime compilation of Razor Class Library is not working correctly at dotnet 6.0 #39404
    6.0.x
  • `@typeparam TItem;` causes invalid syntax tree due to missing ";" #39616
    7.0-preview1
  • ReaderThrowsResetExceptionOnInvalidBody test failure #27400
    Test failures
  • RequestBody_SyncReadDisabledByDefault_WorksWhenEnabled test failure #27399
    Test failures
  • Correct `SynchronousReadAndWriteTests.ReadAndWriteSynchronously` test #26294
    Test failures
  • .Net 6.0.1 Blazor Wasm - Cannot move or rename MainLayout.razor #39638
  • Model validation for non-nullable array elements #38548
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [Release/5.0] Skip failing test due to expired cert #39690
    area-security, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Skip failing cert tests for now #39687
    area-security, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Bump log4js from 6.3.0 to 6.4.0 in /src/SignalR/clients/ts/FunctionalTests #39686

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Shell] On windows there is no Titlebar #4267
  • FlyoutBackgroundColor and FlyoutBackground on Windows are not working #4266
  • XAML Enter control issue on .NET MAUI Preview 10 for Android #4264
  • Nested Navigation Pages #4263
  • Crash on startup for default MAUI Blazor app on Android release mode #4262
  • [Android] Measure infinite loop #4261
  • [WinUI] Finish filling in all the styling mappers on WinUI TabbedPageHandler #4260
  • [Android] DatePicker popup shows empty view #4254
  • DisplayAlert bug #4253
  • Warning NU1703 only for net6.0-maccatalyst when adding package Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.SqlServer #4252
  • Clip property is not working properly in preview 12 #4250
  • Border background color is not updated in window machine #4248
  • ArgumentNullException in Resizetizer after adding svg images for splashscreen #4247
  • Views Don't Support RightToLeft Layout #4245

Closed

  • Convert FrameRenderer's over to using the IViewHandler based mechanisms #4212
  • `mono.android-arm` workload fails to install #4146
  • [Bug] [Android] Wrong text color in menu items #2330
  • Blank MAUI shows CS0103 "The name 'InitializeComponent' does not exist in the current context" #4098
  • [Bug] FileProvider android in maui and xamarin.essentials conflict #2705

PullRequests

Created

  • Support opening a new window in iOS Blazor WebView #4268
    area/blazor 🕸️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • [X] restore compiled converters on Core types #4255

Merged

  • WinUI TabbedPage Handler #4257
  • Frame Compatibility Handlers #4210
  • [workload] add missing Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Build.Tasks.pdb #4265
  • [workload] move all build tasks out of library-packs #4235
  • Implement GoBack, GoForward and Reload methods in WebViewHandler #3316
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • Update Maui Graphics and SkiaSharp #4220
    area/drawing ✏️, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • [ci] Sign .ttf files in templates #4213

Updated

  • First pass at porting doc comments from Forms API docs #4099
    area/docs 📓
  • [ci] Target the Mac internal-macOS-11 hosted agent pool #4241
  • [Android] Changes to reduce unnecessary layout requests #4229
    area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, partner
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄
  • [Catalyst] Fix OnPlatform on macOS #3763
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/Xaml </>, do-not-merge
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #4130
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Context Prematurely Disposed While In Scope #27246
  • Delete and add an object with child object, the child object will double #27245
  • Support for Azure AD RBAC when using Cosmos DB #27244
  • SQLitePCLRaw.provider.e_sqlite3: Unable to load shared library 'e_sqlite3' or one of its dependencies. #27243
  • check keyless entity for null server side evaluation #27242
  • EF Core 6 - Sql server int to BIT mapping not allowed #27240
  • TemporalAll() in Temporal Tables with child entity gives System.InvalidOperationException when used with Include() #27237

Closed

  • Add overload `EnableRetryOnFailure` that allows specifying `errorCodesToAdd` without count / delay #27074
    7.0.0
  • Investigate timeouts on Mac builds #25811
  • Look into using the new Microsoft.Extensions.Logging compile-time source generator #24988
  • OData/Test: reuse OnModelCreating infra from the regular tests in our OData tests #22520
  • Test: Create a TestBase which allows inserting custom model to run queries #17588
    6.0.0
  • Cleanup: Consider unifying sync and async code paths #10902
  • Verify actual expression not translated for SimpleQuerySqliteTest #17265
  • Test: Verify exception message for client eval case #17328
  • Apply FirstOrDefault() before Select() in Entity Framework #27211
  • EF Core 5 on Unity 2021.2 #27241
  • Collection Navigation Property is not Loading #27226
  • EF Core 6 - IsTemporal adds an unnecessary migration when DefaultSchema is configured at the DbContext Level #26676

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Update build and test machines #27238
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/5.0] Stop building w/ VS2017 in CI #27236
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/3.1] Stop building w/ VS2017 in CI #27235
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Update branding to preview2 #27234

Merged

  • Add overload to SqlServerDbContextOptionsBuilder.EnableRetryOnFailure with errorNumbersToAdd without forcing maxRetryCount and maxRetryDelay #27135
    community-contribution
  • [main] Update build and test machines #27239
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix to #26676 - EF Core 6 - IsTemporal adds an unnecessary migration when DefaultSchema is configured at the DbContext Level #27198
  • Update branding to preview1 #27232

Updated

  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw to 2.0.8-pre20220111224339 #27191
  • Add support for index sort order (descending) #27210
  • [release/2.1] Stop building w/ VS2017 in CI #27233
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/2.1] Move off expiring machine pools #26794
    area-infrastructure
